pages.text: Paraceratherium wander the plains of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Paraceratherium alongside Yaks. $(br2)Paraceratherium can be tamed much like horses and can have saddles and chests.
When tamed, they can carry up to 2 players. $(br2)Paraceratherium enjoy: $(br2)Apples, Wheat and (TFC)Barely.
